data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Duwal, Ram Keshari, Oh, Minsuk, Lee, Seunghwan (2016): A new species of Decomia Poppius from Laos and Thailand, with an annotated checklist and keys to genera and species of tribe Decomiini from Indochina (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Phylinae). Zootaxa 4189 (2): 301-310, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4189.2.6|11 occurrences
